Title: Beyonder Clan
ChangeLog:
Version 0.9.5:

 * Bug fix: The 'replay run' button will no longer randomize starting classes if they were originally randomized.

 * Rephrased the description of the 'Black Light' artifact to help clarify its effects.

 * Slightly reduced 'Seizure's' scaling damage from 30 per Mania to 25.

 * Updated status effects to make icons visible. Added some VFX effects as well.

 * Added new Mutator 'Petty Vengeance.' This adds a Vengeful Shard to the deck after each battle.

 * Added new Mutator 'Madness Within.' This makes all cards Manic during battle, but adds some Beyonder cards to help make use of this.

 * Tweaked how the localization of unit essences is handled to allow for better optimization.

 * Fixed a typo in the tutorial text.

 * Added tooltip icons for Anxiety and Hysteria unit triggers.

 * Cost adjustments from the randomized unit essences now also effect X cost units.

 * The Cave of a Thousand Eyes grows restless. Find them in the wild, or recruit them with the 'Restless Beast' mutator or 'Truest Champion' expert challenge.
